segments.text: How'd you like to go on a bungee jump this weekend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm not sure . I promised to help my sister move Saturday .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about Sunday , then ? We could start in the morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I might be able to do that . But I don't think I can do it well .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't worry . It is a test of physical endurance , intelligence . Just to finish it is considered a victory for most .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I'll talk to you later .
segments.speaker: S2
